name: jdhenry105

text: Beef can look as angry as the next, but cannot work up the gusto to actually roar.

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: this is interesting, because he can holler like no ones business when he wants to kill a chicken...

name: luckypyjamas
text: or when he makes moussaka

text: and there is no one there to eat it.

text:
It's the arm fluff
it makes his paws look small and impotent

text: Unless you disrespect Weldon. Beef's roar is too formidable for just playin.

name: aaron_haynes
text: His anger translates as intensely stating the idea of cat noises.

name: c_dizzle
text: official favorite quote. yes it is.

name: apricotta
text: I read that strip over 24 hours ago and that line still cracks me up. Every five minutes, whatever I'm doing, I smile at the thought of this strip.

name: apricotta
text: Four days later, this is still true.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
it will be true forever.

forever.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Is it still true?

name: belgand
text: Yes.

name: apricotta
text: Of course it is. Forever is not done yet, hello?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Amstel over Rhino piss any day. Dos Equis, not so sure.

name: mr-siegal
text: Looks like  it's over now.

name: anomalous3
text: Is it really any wonder that the cats have taken on some of the better facets of the human condition? (They've almost always had most of the worst ones, but their natural graces make up for it.)

name: sargasm
text: Better to be a cat satisfied than a pig dissatisfied.

text:

name: sp1derbaby
text: Man, Pat's like an obnoxious Ignatius J. Reilly.

name: comrade_tom
text: Heheheh anything that reinds me of "the Tull" gets a five.

name: direhaggis
text: The elaboration on how Ray and Roast Beef would eat the gazelle is an interesting juxtaposition. While they may be 'pee-wees', they probably snack hella fantastic compared to the lion what had only warm guts and no peanut-ancho coulis.

text: I clicked on this comic because Manes is my last name but pronounced differently.

text: " Mah-nez "?

text: Ma-yo-naisse?

text: Hell of such as giggles out my ass!

name: tekende
text: You should probably see a proctologist about that.

name: redmange
text: I am in the Tull army and my hair looks like that.  This makes me very proud.  More then makes up for the stabs at bass players later on.

name: sdskyle
text: I like that they're cats who call each other "dogg."

name: greenkoolayd
text: theyre cats that call each other "dogg" AND THEY HATE DOGS.  its either really funny, or really hypocritical.

name: nlaw
text: Ray arms look like they're being pulled back by invisible ropes, especially with the frill bracelets on his wrists.  Or is it just me rope fetish talking?  OH NOs!

name: keir
text: "Hell of such as meow" is one of my favourite quotes

name: unclemikey
text: The concept of a Tull Army caught me unprepared

name: cracklewater
text:
Domestic cats ain't bred down from big cats. The wild versions of domestic cats are a little bigger, but housecats be majestic little killers in they own right.

More likely, Ray and Beef are divorced from their red-in-tooth-and-claw instincts due to easy Cali living.

name: maldraedior
text: in this strip Ray has one nipple directly in the center of his chest

name: layzerblade
text: The Solo.

name: greenkoolayd
text: no way, dude.  you just need to clean your monitor.

name: genequagmire
text: This is so wonderful.

name: sevenslashfour
text:
This whole strip could have stopped at panel 1 and it still would be pure gold.

Hell of such as meow.

name: razorman57
text: cats live in much more luxory than lions and the like.

name: tbtabby
text: ...Why is "Rhino" capitalized? Has one of Spider-Man's nemeses been reduced to using puddles as toilets? The true horrors of One More Day finally come to light!
